entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 1 May 2023
